snippet.title: The Picture in the House - Game Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
This December 12, 2020 will be the 100th anniversary of the story "The picture in the house" written by H. P. Lovecraft.
We wanted to pay homage to it by creating our own playable interpretation
Completely free!

Wishlist on Steam!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1489010/The_Picture_in_The_House/

Website: https://www.dystopiagame.com
Ig: https://www.instagram.com/dystopiagamestudio/
@dystopiagamestudio
Email: studios.dystopia@gmail.com
